comment: Any columns other than img_id and diagnostic is optional and will not break the system. Note that if using .npy or .pkl the file HAS to be a numpy array with 2 columns with the same values are seen here.

No extra rows are allowed. Make sure the diagnostic column is one of [BCC SCC MEL ACK NEV SEK] or the number 0 or 1. No dots are allowed in image names except the file extension. All images have to be png files.
